item.description:
Continuing with the event that is getting to be the most entertaining in Boston. This month Dj Hernan and Tambó Presents The Zafire Dance Project from NYC.

Zafire Dance Project is born from well-known and recognized dancers, Carlos (Hernandez) & Arlette (Guerra).
Carlos and Arlette are two of the top, established dancers in NYC. Both have careers as professional dancers, and have teamed up to become one of the most sought-after couples for performances and workshops, in congresses and events, world-wide.

Their team performances have been described as delightful, inspiring and simply a dedicated team showing their best. Do not miss their performances this month at Tambó.

We also we offer salsa lessons at 6pm with Metamovements a dancing/gymnastics company in the Boston area, led by Anara Piers Frank. Learn the basics, intermediate steps and if we are in the Cuban mood, some Rueda Dancing.

And for those looking for their Salsa Gear, we will have Shoegaloo in the house, with the best in dance-inspired shoes.

Salsa Class: 6:00 pm
Performances at 8:30pm
Dance 'til 10pm
Cover is $14 with salsa lesson
$12 dance only (Special Event)

Tambó Salsa
24 Roland St., Charlestown, Massachusetts 02129
more information at www.TAMBOSALSA.COM

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Zafire Dance project, performing at Tambo Salsa!
